required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Evaluation Comparing the Effects of Constant Current Versus Constant Voltage in Deep Brain Stimulation Using Hybrid Systems

brief_summary.textblock: This post-marketing evaluation has been designed to consistently investigate the subject's preference when switching from a Medtronic® constant voltage or constant current device to a St Jude Medical Infinity™ or St Jude Medical Brio™ constant current system. As electrodes will not be re-positioned, differences in subject's preference are to be explained by the difference in shape of the delivered pulse or waveform between the two systems.

primary_outcome.measure: The proportion of subjects who indicate preference on constant current over constant voltage at the 3 Month follow-up visit.
primary_outcome.description: The proportion of subjects who indicate preference on constant current over constant voltage at the 3 Month follow-up visit will be assessed.

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of safety events related to battery replacement procedures for hybrid systems
secondary_outcome.description: The event rate will be summarized as (1) number of events per patient-year of follow up and (2) incidence rate. The number of events per patient-year of follow-up will be calculated as the total number of safety events related to battery replacement procedures for hybrid systems divided by total follow-up duration from IPG replacement visit to either 12 months visit or withdrawal visit (patient-years). The incidence rate (%) will be calculated as number of subjects who undergo IPG replacement and encounter safety events related to battery replacement procedure for hybrid system divided by total subjects who undergo IPG replacement.

arm_group.arm_group_label: SJM Infinity™ DBS IPG or a SJM Brio™ DBS IPG system
arm_group.description: Subjects will be implanted with SJM Infinity™ DBS IPG or a SJM Brio™ DBS IPG system

intervention.intervention_name: SJM Infinity™ DBS IPG or SJM Brio™ DBS IPG system
intervention.description: Implanted Medtronic® IPG will be explanted and replaced by a SJM Infinity™ DBS IPG or a SJM Brio™ DBS IPG system
intervention.arm_group_label: SJM Infinity™ DBS IPG or a SJM Brio™ DBS IPG system

study_pop.textblock: Subjects who have a diagnosis matching the approved indication and are being considered for an IPG replacement comprise the target population of this study. All subjects who meet the inclusion and none of the exclusion criteria and have signed an Ethics Committee (EC) or Institutional Review Board (IRB) approved informed consent will be considered enrolled in the study.

facility.name: Albany Medical College at Albany Medical Ctr
Fondazione Istituto Neurologico Nazionale C. Mondino
Azienda Ospedaliero-Universitaria S Maria della Misericordia
